name: pnp-list-formatting-weather-column
title: Live Weather Column Formatter
shortDescription: Displays live weather images for each list item based on City, State, and Country columns using SharePoint column formatting JSON.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates how to display live weather images directly in a SharePoint list column. By using City, State, and Country columns, the JSON dynamically generates a working WeatherForYou.net image URL for each row, showing current weather conditions without the need for Power Automate or additional workflows.

references.name: Use column formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: Column formatting allows customizing how fields in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. This sample shows how to display live weather images dynamically based on column values.
